Kosuke holds the frying pan he usually carries on his back in front of him and attacks the opponent like a projectile, spinning wildly as he does so.

== Trivia ==
* Though unnamed in the anime, this technique was named in ''Naruto Mobile''.
* In the anime, this technique is aimed at protecting against attack; however, it is an attack itself in the game.
